prompt:
Please explain how you would approach writing a review for a book that you've just finished reading.
I am a literature student who is looking to write a review about a new novel I recently read called "The Midnight Library." The author, Jessica McHugh, explores the concept of an alternative reality where every book ever written exists as its own place in time and space. I've jotted down some key points and observations from my reading experience that I'd like to incorporate into my review.
